values.description: We believe in empowering communities to take charge of their environmental future.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the dedicated individuals behind Ecologicamentes.

members.name: Maria Rodriguez
members.bio: With over 15 years of experience in environmental advocacy, Maria founded Ecologicamentes to bridge the gap between global environmental challenges and local solutions.

members.name: Carlos Mendez
members.bio: Carlos develops and implements our educational programs, bringing his background in environmental education to inspire the next generation of environmental stewards.

members.name: Sofia Blanco
members.bio: Sofia works directly with communities to understand their environmental needs and develop tailored programs that address local challenges.

steps.description: We generate revenue through our merchandise and workshops, reinvesting profits into our environmental projects.

steps.description: We collaborate with like-minded organizations and secure grants to fund larger initiatives.

steps.title: Community Investment
